description.value: You keep your bombs and bomb-related reagents in easy-toreach pouches from which you draw without thinking. You Interact to draw a bomb, draw a versatile vial, or use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Quick Alchemy] to create a bomb, then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Strike] with the bomb. If you have the ability to create more than one bomb at a time with Quick Alchemy (such as from the double brew class feature), you can Strike with only one of the bombs you create with this action.
